metadata.name: Gzip Archive Decode Via PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects attempts of decoding encoded Gzip archives via PowerShell.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gzipstream')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::decompress')))

output.summary: Detects attempts of decoding encoded Gzip archives via PowerShell.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrative scripts may use this functionality. Use "ParentImage" in combination with the script names and allowed users and applications to filter legitimate executions Reference: https://www.zscaler.com/blogs/security-research/onenote-growing-threat-malware-distribution
